title: So why doesn't Riot ban new champions for like 2 weeks in ranked?
body: I've been thinking this for awhile and I doubt I'm the only one but why doesn't Riot like temp ban new champs in ranked instead of players having to waste a ban on them since people will just "yolo" it and basically troll their own team?

replies.body:
Its a great idea. 

Because its a great idea, rito wont do it. They has to protects the trolls.
Why have good ideas when you can troll and make it impossible to climb right?
I agree, ban em for a week or two
Money, that is 100% the reason they do it that way.
Funny enough I just found out Blizzard does that with Overwatch, when Doomfist was released he couldn't be picked in ranked for the first week.
Makes sense doesnt it? Stops feeders, guys who yolo and yea
imo 1 week would be fairer but this idea seems great.
